title: RB Leipzig vs. Liverpool: Extended Highlights | UCL on CBS Sports
author: Champions League on CBS Sports
description:
Liverpool took down RB Leipzig 2-0 in the first first leg of the Round of 16 in the UEFA Champions League.  Salah opened the scoring in the 53’ after a scoreless first half. Then just 5 minutes later Mané found the back of the net to double the English side’s advantage. 
After Leipzig came out in the first half with plenty of confidence Liverpool was able to weather the storm then go on a fantastic five minute stretch to solidify the first leg win. The second leg will be at Anfield in Liverpool. 

Stream every UEFA Champions League match live on CBS All Access:
http://bit.ly/ucloncbssports

#UEFA #ChampionsLeague #UCL #Roundof16 #Salah #Mane #Liverpool #TheReds #Leipzig #USMNT #TylerAdams

localize.description:
在欧冠16强首回合比赛中，利物浦2-0拿下RB莱比锡。 在上半场不分胜负的情况下，萨拉赫在53'开球。然后仅仅5分钟后，马内就找到了后点，将英格兰队的优势扩大了一倍。
莱比锡在上半场拿出充足的信心后，利物浦能够经受住风浪的考验，然后在5分钟内上演精彩的表演，巩固了首场比赛的胜利。第二场比赛将在利物浦的安菲尔德球场进行。

localize.description:
在歐冠16強首回合比賽中，利物浦2-0拿下RB萊比錫。 在上半場不分勝負的情況下，薩拉赫在53'開球。然後僅僅5分鐘後，馬內就找到了後點，將英格蘭隊的優勢擴大了一倍。
萊比錫在上半場拿出充足的信心後，利物浦能夠經受住風浪的考驗，然後在5分鐘內上演精彩的表演，鞏固了首場比賽的勝利。第二場比賽將在利物浦的安菲爾德球場進行。
